message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $110. I believe it would be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your interest.  How about we meet in the middle at $100?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Would you be willing to go that low?
